name: Avoid using Javascript Regexp typecheck in AngularJS application
description: You should use the angular.isRegexp method instead of the default JavaScript implementation (toString.call(/^A/) === "[object RegExp]"). This rule is compliant with CISQ OMG ASCRM-CWE-252-data, ASCRM-CWE-704, ASCMM-MNT-20 recommendations.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: Ensure you are using the official AngularJS API, you should use AngularJS isRegexp.
